adrFormatAddress: 185 Greenwich St Space LL2410, New York, NY 10007, USA

editorialSummary.text: Long-standing chain selling the brand's contemporary Swiss-made watches in a variety of styles.

originalText.text: The delightful experience I had at Swatch deserves a glowing review! The employee Luz went above and beyond to assist me in selecting the perfect watch. Their sweetness and genuine enthusiasm made the entire shopping process enjoyable. The level of customer service at Swatch is truly commendable, and I left the store not only with a stylish timepiece but also with a positive and memorable shopping memory. Highly recommend this store for both the fantastic product range and outstanding service!

text.text: The delightful experience I had at Swatch deserves a glowing review! The employee Luz went above and beyond to assist me in selecting the perfect watch. Highly recommend this store for both the fantastic product range and outstanding service!

originalText.text: I just had an extremely disappointing experience at this particular swatch store location. I went in to return a watch that I had recently purchased at a different location. At the time of the purchase I confirmed that I would be able to return the watch at any other location.I am a religious Jew which is obviously determined by the way I look. And when I tried to return the watch at this location ( World Trade Center) I was told that they cannot accept the return because there was a slight rip on the outer packaging of the box and they didn’t like the way the watch was packaged. They said they were uncomfortable taking it because it is not a watch that they sell in this store. Now this is obviously a ridiculous claim because the watch was clearly unworn with the stickers still on it and none of this being the company policy. It seems as though they were looking for reasons not to accept the return. They were extremely unkind and Unhelpful not trying to help us in any way very clearly trying to inconvenience us. Unfortunately there is no other logical explanation to what I experienced other than blatant antisemitism. I am saddened and disappointed by what I experienced today. And I hope that swatch takes the necessary steps to ensure that such treatment of any customers never occurs again at this store or any other store. (Attached is a photo of the “damaged packaging”)

originalText.text:
For approximately a year, I have been trying to add to my collection of Bioceramic MoonSwatch watches.
I visited the Swatch store to check on the availability of 'Mission to the Moon' and 'Mission to Mercury' to add to my collection of Saturn and Mars.
The sales young lady was helpful courteous, professional and knowledgeable about the collection.
I was happy when she told me that both of my choices were available.
I now own four MoonSwatch and my girlfriend who purchased a 'Mission to Pluto' now owns two.

originalText.text: Every time I travel, I get the city’s destination watches and coming to a Swatch in NYC I didn’t realize there was three swatches for it! The salesperson with curly hair was very kind in helping me out in trying all 3 on and let me spend time deciding, really recommend coming here.

originalText.text: The gentleman who assisted me and my wife was great! I do appreciate the service and welcoming vibe he provided! I greatly appreciate him. He provided topnotch fair treatment! 10 stars in my book. AA++
